description_html:
An innovative new member of the Brisa® family of intelligent performance fabrics, Mokume [mo-koo-meh] is inspired by nature, perfected by science, and custom-crafted with beauty and functionality in mind.

Mokume's name is derived from the Japanese characters Moku, meaning “tree,” and Me, meaning “eye,” Mokume’s aesthetic was inspired by its resemblance to the unique vertical wood graining of mature tree trunks. Blending distinctive performance attributes and unbeatable softness well-known to Brisa®, its textural appeal is highlighted by an earthy palette of fourteen hues, adding a natural touch to any environment.

Mokume's impressive list of performance attributes synonymous with the Brisa® family includes acoustic properties, created by a unique cellular structure that dissipates sound transfer for noise reduction. Combined with unbeatable softness, Mokume will add a natural touch to any environment.
